question.title: What is an epiphyseal fracture-decollement according to the Salter and Harris classification?
question.description: A type of fracture specific to children

option_a.title: Apophyseal avulsion fracture
option_a.description: A type of fracture that occurs at the end of a long bone

option_b.title: Greenstick fracture
option_b.description: A type of fracture that occurs when a bone bends and partially breaks

option_c.title: Butterball fracture
option_c.description: A type of fracture that occurs when a piece of bone breaks off and becomes dislodged

option_d.title: Salter-Harris fracture
option_d.description: A type of fracture that involves the growth plate in children
